name: Slow Cooker Asian Chop Suey
description: Make this Asian fave now or assemble ahead of time, either way you get to take the night off from cooking. Come home to a satisfying dinner and its delicious aroma that will fill your home.

ingredients.name: lean ground beef, chicken, or pork
low sodium soy sauce or gluten free soy sauce

preparation:
Make it now:

  1. Combine all ingredients in a slow cooker and stir gently.
  2. Cover and cook for 3 hours on high or 6 hours on low setting.

Make it ahead and freeze:

  1. Place a large freezable bag standing open in a bowl; this will keep it in place when adding ingredients.
  2. Place all ingredients except broth in the bag, seal, and lay flat in the freezer.
  3. When ready to eat, remove from freezer at least 1 hour before cooking.
  4. Place contents in the slow cooker, add broth, cover and cook for 3 hours on high or 6 hours on low setting.
tips: Make it vegetarian, swap meat with 2 lbs (900 g) cubed firm organic tofu.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup bean sprouts and 1 cup cooked rice or noodles
